medical_history.chief_complaint: Increasing abdominal pain with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal discomfort noted following a meal on the morning of admission, which developed into severe epigastric, non-radiating, sharp, burning pain accompanied by nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CAD, DMII, HTN, Hyperlipidemia, CRI on dialysis; suicide attempt (antifreeze); previous surgeries include colectomy for diverticulitis with ostomy s/p revision and takedown, ventral hernia repair with mesh, left knee repair, left shoulder repair, back surgery.
